a collection of observations with inputs and outputs.
 Sliding window is the way to restructure a time series dataset as a supervised learning
problem.
 Multivariate and multi-step forecasting time series can also be framed as supervised
learning using the sliding window method.
4.8.1 Next
In the next lesson, you will discover naive and classical time series forecasting methods that you
absolutely must evaluate before investigating more sophisticated deep learning methods.
